name: Paint Wars
description:
Two to four players! Two sticks each! Five levels! Three extra weapons! In the end only one has more points than the others and wins. Except when two players have the same amount of points. This can happen as well. But no matter! 

Originally released on Xbox Live Indie Games, this is a simple twin stick deathmatch shooter that plays better than it looks. There is no single player mode. Sorry!

Credits:

Game by Paschalis. You can find me on twitter @pasculator.
Sound effects from Sound Jay.

Requirements:

You will need at least two controllers. I have only tested it with Xbox 360 and Xbox One controllers but more should work theoretically.
